name: Gladius
body:
## 3.0.1 Release
- Tagging as release.

## 3.0.1 Alpha 6
- Added zhCN and zhTW localizations.

## 3.0.1 Alpha 5
- DRTracker fixes.
- Healthbar fixes.
- Code cleanup.

## 3.0.1 Alpha 4
- Auras update.

## 3.0.1 Alpha 3
- Lib updates.

## 3.0.1 Alpha 2
- Added support for xCT and xCT+.
- Added Korean localizations.
- Code cleanup.

## 3.0.1 Alpha 1
- Code cleanup.

## 3.0.0 Release
- Updated for 5.2.
- Spell updates.
- Library updates.
- Minor bug fixes.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
